resources.string: Use this as the default group for newly added
Light Label & Text Dark Group Bar
Move All to Selected Default Groups

When this service is enabled, Lightning Launcher will open automatically when you hover the cursor over the App Library icon on the right of dock for about half a second.
(This may make it difficult to access the default launcher)
 
Make sure to enable the "Use Lightning Launcher" switch - the "Lightning Launcher Shortcut" switch won't do anything on the Quest!
Launching 2D apps or websites in a separate window allows for easier multitasking on Quest devices, but will cause certain apps to not always launch.\n\nIf you have any issues, disable this option!

Turning this option off will hide the top bar when not in Edit Mode. 
 
The settings button will also be hidden when not in Edit Mode.
 
To turn on Edit Mode, press the back button on the top of the window, or B on your controller.

Websites will open in a pop-up browser in the launcher for easy access.
 
This is not the same as the default Quest browser, so VR websites will not work.
 
The web page will continue running in background when closed, and will be able to play audio in the background.
 
(This feature is experimental, please report any issues on GitHub)
Enter a valid URL and try again

By enabling the shortcut service, Lighting Launcher will open when you hover over the App Library icon on the right of the dock, essentially replacing the default launcher.\n\nAlternatively, you can use the LauncherShortcut apk provided on the GitHub. (Make sure to carefully read the instructions in the README if you choose this option)

1. Use the button to open Android's accessibility settings
2. Tap on "Lightning Launcher"
3. Switch the service on (or off) at the top of the page
4. Tap "Allow" on the prompt
Tap an app to or tap here to select
1 app selected, tap a group to move it
%d apps selected, tap a group to move them
Update from version %1$s to %2$s, without taking off your headset!
You should get a prompt to install in a few seconds
This is set as the default group for websites
